page.title: 14Gweek Nurseries
page.content: Gweek Nurseries is owned by Mr.Mrs. Froggatt.The nursery has been here since about 1958.There has been two other owners and Mr. Mrs. Froggatt are the third owners.They took over nearly eight years ago now.When they took over it was mainly all salad and food crops.Slowly over the years they have changed to all pot plants both hardy and indoor. It takes five thousand gallons to water his plants on a sunny day and a thousand gallons on a dull day.We have seven hundred tomato plants for are selves.Their tomatoes produce about six tons.They have up to about nine hundred to one thousand types of plants.The rarest plant they have is the lapagera.It is a climbing plant from South America.
